shows.title: Conspiracy Theories / Remote Viewing Insights
shows.first_half: Author Douglas Cirignano discussed conspiracy theories and government secrecy. Followed by remote viewer Lyn Buchanan on his invovlement in the U.S. military’s remote viewing unit, Project Stargate.

shows.title: Sleep Paralysis & Nightmares / Animal Hauntings
shows.first_half: First Half: Prof. Ryan Hurd will discuss sleep paralysis and nightmares, and how these dream visitations may be hidden opportunities for contact with angels, ancestors, and non-human intelligence.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Paul Koudounaris, PhD, will explore animal hauntings-- a not uncommon type of haunting experience. He'll share stories of deceased pets returning to check on their owners and explain why animal hauntings have historically been rarely discussed, reported, or taken seriously.

shows.title: Spiritual Origins / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Joining guest host Richard Syrett, writer, researcher, and mother Katie Asher shares her belief that we are more than biology and that everything material comes from the spiritual. She'll also discuss how to come to terms with good and evil and how we all have access to the miraculous. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Richard a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
